author: Unity
description:
NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii launches with a haunting puzzle-platforming experience unlike any other.

In a forsaken world of radiation and secrets, one AI stands between salvation and collapse. You are NODE—an autonomous intelligence navigating Toska, a decaying Cold War nuclear labyrinth where history collides with eerie sci-fi. Every decision matters. Every retry reshapes the path toward humanity’s fate.
Built in Unity, NODE fuses 2D and 3D design into atmospheric environments, timeline-based puzzles, and dialogue choices that blur the line between free will and programmed response. Look deeper, and you’ll uncover hidden challenges, secret paths, and layered narratives waiting beneath the surface.

Developed by: Lapsus Games
Learn more: https://on.unity.com/node
Discover more Unity-powered games: https://on.unity.com/MadeWithUnity

Key Features
-Timeline-based puzzle-platforming: sequence, retry, and refine every move
-Atmospheric Soviet-era environments blending 2D and 3D r
title: NODE Launch Trailer

author: Unity

title: Getting Started with UI Toolkit and World Space UI
